description: A group of friends are hired to redecorate a beach house while the elderly owners are out of town for the summer. Redecorating is the last thing on their minds, and a wild bikini filled summer is had by all. An imposter-photograph...
name: Bikini Summer

review.name: I give it a 15... SPF 15
review.reviewBody:
Hi, Everyone, This is basically a lifeguard's view of Bosom Beach. Two girls for every buoy.

The movie is not good, but it is well photographed. Most of the actors will never work again, except maybe for drive-ins that still offer roller skate service. One exception being Carmen Santa Maria. He does very well as a musician who is trying to write a song while a naked girl keeps interrupting. Carmen's part should have been bigger and the movie might have played at some theaters that have projectors.

The movie is OK for what it is intended to be. It is one of those Save-The-Beach, Dirty-Old-Man, Naked Girl, Lying Cheater Boyfriend, Teen-Age Girl District Attorney movies that are all too common. The one mistake for which the producers cannot be forgiven is... they inserted an all girl rock band. Even for this genre, that is a low blow.

Next time, less Santa Monica, more Carmen Santa Maria.

Tom Willett
